job_title: New College Grad - Semiconductor Product Quality Assurance Engineer
job_description:
• Strong analytical (statistical methods to perform data analysis, knowledge of Failure Modes and Effects Analysis -FMEA, understanding of inline defect detection and failure analysis techniques), problem-solving (understanding of problem-solving methodologies such as 8D, Kepner-Tregoe or Six Sigma) Bachelor’s degree in Electrical, Electronics, Materials Science, Micro-Electronics, Physics, or a related field.
• Must also be willing/able to work weekends or evenings, as needed.
